channel.title: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz
channel.description: Can anyone please tell me how to launch my server so other people could login with or without hamachi. Do not redirect me to other posts just tell me this isn't hard. I portforwarded but my friend still can't login even with hamachi. Edit: needed to add more information. I want to launch ErasedPkz http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=515005.0

item.title: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Make sure you’re portforwarding correctly, and that everything in the client matches your details, i.e. IP address, ports etc…

http://canyouseeme.org will help you to check if your ports are open.

Read full topic
item.source: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz

item.title: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

Most server’s have server =…Search for that or search for the current ip which is probably 127.0.0.1…(this is client sided if you didn’t know)

Read full topic
item.source: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz

item.title: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

smitty1998:

Use no-ip. It’s alot easier.

Actually, no.

No-ip causes many unneeded complications, and an extra connection which can delay a good connection.

Read full topic

Any tips?

item.source: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz

item.title: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Go to either http://www.yougetsignal.com/tools/open-ports/ or http://www.canyouseeme.org/
Put the port that you opened into the input box, and the site will tell you if it is opened or not.

Read full topic

item.title: I got a very awkward problem. ErazedPkz
item.dc:creator: @Flame3 John
item.description:
@Flame3 wrote:

Did you change the client’s ip? Did you check through a port-checking website that you are in fact portfowarded? Does your friend have Java installed? (stupid question it seems, but more and more people these days)
Did you follow a tutorial to help you set up your server?

Read full topic
